summary:
Silent Hill Terrorizes SKYRIM!!!

Pyramid Head is a lumbering, monstrous man who wields an impossibly large blade and wears a blood stained, triangular metal helmet. Pyramid Head seems to exist only to brutalize and kill the people of Skyrim.

Each item comes with its own description.
descriptionHtml:
Silent Hill Terrorizes SKYRIM!!!

Pyramid Head is a lumbering, monstrous man who wields an impossibly large blade and wears a blood stained, triangular metal helmet. Pyramid Head seems to exist only to brutalize, rape and kill the people of Skyrim.

Each item comes with its own description.

The Pyramid Head Recipe:

1 Daedra Heart
1 Dwarven Ingot
2 Corundum Ingots
2 Iron Ingots

The Pyramid Head Temper Recipe:

2 Corundum Ingots


The Pyramid Head Stats:

Weight: 22.0
Armor Rating: 42.00



The Great Knife Recipe:

1 Daedra Heart
1 Corundum Ingot
1 Iron Greatsword

The Great Knife Temper Recipe:

1 Human Flesh
1 Corundum Ingot


The Great Knife Stats:

Weight: 22.0 (A big knife has to be heavy)
Reach: 2.10 (A lot of reach for a big knife)
Speed: 0.39 (Slow attack that can get you killed!)
Damage: 600 (The Great Knife kills with one hit as the Silent Hill wiki says)
Crit Dmg: 750 (Same as above)
Stagger: 1.40
author: Quechus13
